item.title: Alcher and nat stealer (2 diferent scripts)
item.dc:creator: @Pmh1000 Pmh1000
item.description:
@Pmh1000 wrote:

nice job on the scripts but try not to use cords with your scripts if you can help it and i know you cant really help it with a alcher just make sure you have plenty of randomness in the coords and also you can right a function to find the right chest, ive made one. or you could even just use findcolorright that SRL has made in order to find the right one as opposed to the left one. just a few suggestiong bc back in the day i wrote one too but i kept it private and it worked well and for the record i write scripts for other but mainly only use the when testing them, i play legit when i play

item.source: Alcher and nat stealer (2 diferent scripts)

item.title: Alcher and nat stealer (2 diferent scripts)
item.dc:creator: @fook fook
item.description:
@fook wrote:

hey, im mainly legit on rs, but i wrote a few little scripts 2 make my life a bit easier. Both the scripts work Fine IMO, i wrote a nat stealer and an auto alcher.

NATSTEALER…

U GOTTA POSITION THE CAMERA SO THAT IT CAN ONLY SEE THE NATURE CHEST!!

[scar]program nats;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
const
chestcolor = 4018280;

var
traps: integer;

procedure loadbmps;
begin
traps := BitmapFromString(31, 8, ‘z78DA33304000371CC0000310’ +
‘AF92BAEA89770F7E35F414C70F88D7457C9890E7424AE2885435B’ +
‘40E5BF252C2F0703925A98592BC4F6ACAA71C0C94BD83D9E50010’ +
‘C54578’);
end;

procedure theiving;
begin
findcolorspiral(x,y,chestcolor,5,5,515,336);
wait(200+random(50));
mouse(x,y,5,5,false);
findbitmap(traps,x,y);
wait(200+random(50));
mouse(x,y,5,5,true);
end;

procedure findrandoms;
begin
FindNormalRandoms;
end;

begin
setupsrl;
loadbmps;
repeat
theiving;
findrandoms;
until(false)
end.[/scar]

And last be but least, The auto alcher…
NOTE: DO THIS IN EITHER EDGEVILLE BANK OR VAROK EAST, U GOT NO RANDOMS THERE AT ALL!
[scar]program autoalcher;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}

procedure clickbook;
begin
Mouse(738, 187,6,6,true);
wait(1000+random(124));
end;

procedure clickspell;
begin
Mouse(686, 325,6,6,true);
wait(1000+random(124));
end;

procedure clicklongs;
begin
Mouse(583, 229,6,6,true);
wait(1000+random(124));
end;

begin
setupsrl;
repeat
clickbook;
clickspell;
clicklongs;
until(false)
end.[/scar]

+rep if u like pls

Read full topic
